document_data.name: Industrious Brothers and Sisters of Carpentry, Cabinetry, Puppetry, and Toymaking
document_data.orgname: the Industrious Brothers and Sisters of Carpentry, Cabinetry, Puppetry, and Toymaking
document_data.mainbody: The '''Industrious Brothers and Sisters of Carpentry, Cabinetry, Puppetry, and Toymaking''' was an honorary order whose members were devoted to [[Gond]], the Wonderbringer.<ref name="FaA-p63" >
document_data.Organization: Members of this organization praised Gond through their skill in carpentry, toymaking, and puppetry.
